    All Classes and Interfaces

    Class
    Description
    Brush
    The Brush tool used for free-form drawing on the canvas.
    Eraser
     
    LivePreview
    An interface for all tools that can draw a temporary "live preview" on the canvas.
    MiniPaint
    The main application window for the MiniPaint application.
    MouseCursor
    A data class that encapsulates the state of the mouse cursor on the canvas.
    Selection
    A tool for drawing a dashed rectangular selection area.
    Tool
    Abstract parent class for all drawing tools in the MiniPaint application.
